name: 3dLocalHistog
author: AFNI Developers
description: This program computes a local histogram at each voxel in the input datasets.

inputs.description: Defines the region around each voxel to be used for the statistics calculation. Available formats: 'SPHERE(r)', 'RECT(a,b,c)', 'RHDD(a)', 'TOHD(a)'.
inputs.name: Neighborhood String

inputs.description: Use string 'ppp' as the prefix for the output dataset.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Save the overall histogram into file 'sss'. This file will have 2 columns: value and count.
inputs.name: Histogram Save File

inputs.description: Use file 'LL' as a label file.
inputs.name: Label File

inputs.description: Exclude values from 'a' to 'b' from the counting. This option can be used more than once.
inputs.name: Exclude Values

inputs.description: If '-lab_file' is used, then exclude all values that are NOT in the label file (except for 0).
inputs.name: Exclude Non-Labeled Values Flag

inputs.description: Exclude values which appear in the overall histogram fewer than 'mm' times.
inputs.name: Minimum Count

inputs.description: Convert each count to a probability by dividing by the total number of counts at each voxel.
inputs.name: Probability Flag

inputs.description: Stop the highly informative progress reports.
inputs.name: Quiet Flag

output-files.description: The output dataset with the specified prefix
output-files.name: Output Dataset Header

output-files.description: The output dataset with the specified prefix
output-files.name: Output Dataset Brick

output-files.description: The overall histogram saved into the specified file
output-files.name: Histogram File
